name: diller-loyalty/magento-module
description: Diller® is a loyalty platform that boosts customer retention. Marketing automation empowers you to easily set up personalized, revenue-boosting SMS and email campaigns that will keep your customers loyal.

description.en-GB: Diller® is a loyalty platform that boosts customer retention. Marketing automation empowers you to easily set up personalized, revenue-boosting SMS and email campaigns that will keep your customers loyal.
description.de-DE: Diller® ist eine Treueplattform, die die Kundenbindung steigert. Mit der Marketingautomatisierung können Sie ganz einfach personalisierte, umsatzsteigernde SMS- und E-Mail-Kampagnen einrichten, die Ihre Kunden binden.
description.nn-NO: Diller® er en lojalitetsplattform som øker kundebevaring. Markedsføringsautomatisering gir deg mulighet til enkelt å sette opp personlig tilpassede, inntektsfremmende SMS- og e-postkampanjer som vil holde kundene dine lojale.
